title: ValidatorDiff
description: See https://github.com/tendermint/tendermint/blob/v0.34.8/proto/tendermint/abci/types.proto#L229-L235 A `EndWithValidatorUpdate{}` call may return a JSON-encoded ValidatorDiff in Response.data if it wishes to chnage the validator set.

Binary.description:
Binary is a wrapper around Vec<u8> to add base64 de/serialization with serde. It also adds some helper methods to help encode inline.

This is only needed as serde-json-{core,wasm} has a horrible encoding for Vec<u8>

ValidatorUpdate.description: This is used to update the validator set See https://github.com/tendermint/tendermint/blob/v0.34.8/proto/tendermint/abci/types.proto#L343-L346

power.description: This is the voting power in the consensus rounds

pubkey.description: This is the ed25519 pubkey used in Tendermint consensus
